title: Angel Number 121: What It Means & What to Do When You See It

steps.title: Angel number 121 reminds you to prioritize balance in your life.
steps.content: Angel number 121 reminds you to prioritize balance in your life. Your guardian angels (or the universe, or God, or whichever higher power you believe in) may send you 121 when you’re overwhelmed, struggling to make positive change in your life, or just feeling out of whack. It’s a sign that the angels are on your side and want you to realize you have the flexibility and power to take charge of your circumstances. [1] X Research source You may feel out of balance if you’re holding on to negative emotions or past wrongs that are holding you back from pursuing your goals and life purpose. 121 can also be a sign that a fresh start is coming your way. Don’t be afraid of the positive changes on the horizon—they may feel tough at first, but the universe has your back!

steps.title: Angel number 121 combines the energies of 1, 2, and 4.
steps.content: Angel number 121 combines the energies of 1, 2, and 4. Number 1 symbolizes new beginnings, leadership, creativity, goals, and manifestation. Its energy is amplified in 121 because it occurs twice. Number 2 is the number of partnerships, balance, and duality, and it balances beautifully with the energy of 1 in 121 since 1 + 1 = 2. [2] X Research source The energy of 4 permeates 121 because 1 + 2 + 1 = 4. Number 4 is the number of stability, productivity, reliability, and self-expression. Together, the vibrations of these numbers encourage those who see and connect to 121 to release their bad habits and embrace new experiences to bring you closer to your highest good.

steps.title: 121 hints at an upcoming period of spiritual growth and progress.
steps.content: 121 hints at an upcoming period of spiritual growth and progress. Any traumas or emotional blockages that are holding you back from feeling whole might be healed soon, and lots of new opportunities to help others and learn more about yourself will present themselves to you. You’ve worked hard to elevate your spirit, and the angels are rewarding you with new mystic enlightenment. [3] X Research source Angel number 121 is a very powerful number for spiritual well-being. Seeing it often means you’re on the right track toward syncing your body, mind, and soul together to accomplish your goals and find your life’s purpose.

steps.title: If you’re in a relationship, 121 forecasts renewed, deeper love.
steps.content: If you’re in a relationship, 121 forecasts renewed, deeper love. You may begin to notice new quirks your partner has that make you adore them even more, or maybe you just start seeing them as you did for the very first time again. Focus on improving your communication as a couple to strengthen your relationship and grow into a new era of love together. [4] X Research source Other big steps like moving in together, having a child, or getting engaged may also be coming your way after a string of 121 sightings.

steps.title: If you’re single, angel number 121 means new love is on the horizon.
steps.content: If you’re single, angel number 121 means new love is on the horizon. Whether you’re in a dating rut or happily single, 121 could be a sign that you’ll soon meet someone who piques your romantic interest. Keep your heart open to new people as well as old friends and acquaintances—it’s possible you already know your future partner, but just haven’t considered them in this light yet. Put yourself out there and explore new places, social groups, and activities. You’re more likely to meet your perfect match if you get out of your comfort zone .

steps.title: 121 reassures you that your twin flame connection has a divine purpose.
steps.content: 121 reassures you that your twin flame connection has a divine purpose. A twin flame is a person whose soul and purpose in life mirrors yours (they can be a romantic partner or a platonic friend). When you see 121, it’s a sign that your partnership is special and that you’re both on the right track to discover your places in the world. Continue to support each other emotionally and in pursuit of your goals—believe in yourselves and your spirits will flourish! [5] X Research source 121 can also be a reminder for twin flames to be mindful when communicating with each other to preserve and nourish their relationship. If you haven’t met your twin flame yet, seeing 121 is a sign that your union could come soon. Keep your eyes peeled for a person you feel a magnetic, spiritual attraction to.

steps.title: Angel number 121 is very lucky for your business and career prospects.
steps.content: Angel number 121 is very lucky for your business and career prospects. Since number 1 brings you creativity and new beginnings, seeing 121 is the perfect time to start a new project, launch your own business , or push for that promotion you’ve been too timid to ask about. It’s also a sign from your guardian angels that you’re on the right track toward meeting your professional goals. [6] X Research source Remember to make a solid plan before starting a new endeavor. Number 4 is the number of foundations and stability, and it reminds you that great success is built on a platform of hard work, attention to detail, and flexibility.

steps.title: 121 is a reminder to tend to your spiritual and physical well-being.
steps.content: 121 is a reminder to tend to your spiritual and physical well-being. It’s an important, practical number that the angels send when it’s time to make small, simple changes in your life to live healthier. If you’ve been struggling to improve your physical, mental, or spiritual wellness, 121 is also reassurance that you’re on the right track—stick with it! 121 is also a good omen for healing. If you’ve been battling a physical or emotional ailment, your time of peace is almost here! Try meditating or practicing yoga to get started. These activities soothe your body and mind at the same time and can make you feel whole and energized.

steps.title: Amazonite, peridot, and clear quartz can amplify the energies of 121.
steps.content: Amazonite, peridot, and clear quartz can amplify the energies of 121. If you’re struggling to interpret what 121 means for you, try working with crystals to bring clarity to your thoughts and next steps. Hold a crystal in your hand or rest it beside you while you meditate, journal, or do other mindful activities, and set an intention to listen to your intuition. Crystals can help you “feel” what to do next and open up your subconscious needs and desires. [7] X Research source Amazonite helps you become more adaptable to life changes. Peridot reinforces your hope, optimism, and positivity. Clear quartz helps chase away your self-doubts and negative energy. Remember that crystals aren’t necessary to get the benefits of your angel number, but they can be a useful tool.

steps.title: Record what you were doing, thinking, or feeling when you saw 121.
steps.content: Record what you were doing, thinking, or feeling when you saw 121. Each time you encounter 121 (or any angel number), jot down every detail you can remember about the circumstances. The angels typically show you sacred numbers when you’re doing or thinking about something related to their message for you. By reflecting on each 121 sighting, you can decipher what the universe is trying to tell you. Say you get an email at 1:21 p.m. from a coworker asking for your help on a new project. This could be a sign that your collaboration could lead to a promotion or other professional success. Maybe you score a phone number from an attractive stranger at a bar and notice it has 121 in it. This might be a sign that person is your twin flame or a potential romantic interest.

steps.title: Let go of negative feelings and forgive those who’ve wronged you.
steps.content: Let go of negative feelings and forgive those who’ve wronged you. You’ll struggle to move forward in love, your career, or in your spiritual practice if past hurts or self-doubt are holding you back. Start releasing these self-limiting thoughts by forgiving people who’ve hurt you in the past, since holding a grudge won’t serve your greater purpose. Forgive yourself for your own wrongdoings to inflate your spirit, too. [8] X Research source Use positive affirmations to replace specific negative thoughts. If you feel too shy to meet new people, for example, try telling yourself “I am fun and know how to build meaningful relationships” daily. [9] X Research source Reader Poll: We asked 234 wikiHow readers what the most important quality in a good friend is, and 57% of them said Honesty. [Take Poll] Seeing 121 might signal it's time to be honest and clear the air to forge a stronger bond with a friend.

steps.title: Do your best to be optimistic and live in the moment.
steps.content: Do your best to be optimistic and live in the moment. Look at every day as an opportunity to pursue your goals instead of waiting for “the right time.” The angels want you to live up to your potential, so make the most of every opportunity that comes your way whether it’s a chance at a better job or an unlikely first date. Have faith in your abilities to manifest what you want—with the universe’s support, anything is possible! [10] X Research source Don’t be afraid to reach out to your loved ones for help when it comes to pursuing your dreams. Your support system is a gift, so lean on it when you’re feeling unsure or worn out.
